description: A significant number of Windows 10 clients, over 1,000 devices, have not received updates for several months while utilizing Intune update policies. This issue is indicated by the posting of various error codes related to the update failures, which have not been resolved. The persistence of unpatched devices can lead to vulnerabilities within the organizational infrastructure, possibly exposing the system to performance issues and security risks. Administrators are seeking assistance to troubleshoot and rectify these update failures effectively. It is essential to address these errors promptly to ensure compliance and security within the enterprise environment.
